rules.description: 用户在问 Amazon 价格/监控相关需求

templates.reply_amazon_en: Hi, I saw your post '{title}'. I maintain an Amazon price tracker with proxy + Selenium. I can monitor {url} or a list of ASINs, and send alerts on drops.
